Bulk Emails

The Bulk Emails section allows Unit Master users to send the same email to many clients at once, making it easy to share announcements, updates and important notices.

What are Bulk Emails?

The Bulk Emails page is used when you need to send one message to a large group of clients at the same time. Instead of sending individual emails, you prepare the content once and send it to all selected recipients in a single action.

This is useful for general announcements, marketing campaigns and reminders that apply to many clients, and helps ensure that everyone receives the same information.

Send Bulk Emails

The Bulk Emails section is used to send emails to many clients at once. Typical uses include:

  • Announcements or general updates.
  • Campaigns or product information.
  • Important notices or payment / statement reminders.

Bulk email tools save time and ensure that consistent messages reach all relevant clients.

How to prepare a bulk email

On the Bulk Emails screen, you typically:

  • Enter the message you want to send in the content area.
  • Enter or select the email addresses of the recipients.
  • Choose the file to upload if you are using a file with a list of recipients or attachments.

After completing the fields and reviewing the message, send the email so that all selected clients receive it at the same time.
